free: #e It is said that monkeys are transformed by gluttonous people.
#c 聽說猴子是貪吃的人變的。
#n (lit.) 我聽說過猴子（的由來）是人為了貪吃所以變成了現在的猴子。
#e Someone says that the teacher is going to go abroad for one year.
#c 有人說老師要出國一年。

#n *Aiza bunun tupa tu masnanava a hai dau nakusia vaivi asang tu tas tu painsanan (dau hai改成hai dau).*Aiza bunun tupa tu masnanava a dau nakusia vaivi asang tu tas tu painsanan (沒有hai).*Aiza bunun tupa tu masnanava a nakusia vaivi asang tu tas tu painsanan (沒有dau hai). *Dau aiza bunun tupa tu masnanava a hai nakusia vaivi asang tu tas tu painsanan (dau在句首).?Aiza dau bunun tupa tu masnanava a hai nakusia vaivi asang tu tas tu painsanan (dau接在aiza後). Aiza bunun tupa tu masnanava a hai nakusia vaivi asang tu tas tu painsanan dau. (在句末，不確定的疑問)
#e I heard that he said this month will be very hot.
#c 我聽他說這個月天氣會很熱。
#n (lit.) 我聽他說這個月，那個太陽會很熱。ta’azik saicia tupa tu aip tu buan dau hai namapahis a vali. ta’azik saicia tupa tu aip tu buan hai namapahis dau vali a. a vali 其實有點像是 vali a，都有一點點限定的意味
#e A legend says that the black bulbul takes fire for Bunun people.
#c 有傳說說紅嘴鳥曾經為族人取火。
